quote_last: Hollis pulled out his watch. He sighed, replaced the time-piece, and leaned back in his chair. A glance out through the window showed him that the street was deserted except for here and there a cow pony drooping over one of the hitching rails and a wagon or two standing in front of a store.
title: The Coming of the Law
author: Charles Alden Seltzer

quote_time_case: before the clock had struck six
title: The Hammer of God
author: Bo Giertz
